entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the main character in the story, as mentioned by his name being used in the context of receiving an essay back from Snape.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another student in the class, as mentioned by her name being used in the context of encouraging Harry to get going.

entities.name: professor umbridge
entities.description: Professor Umbridge is a teacher at Hogwarts, as mentioned by her name being used in the context of inspecting classes.

entities.name: binns
entities.description: Binns is a History of Magic teacher at Hogwarts, as mentioned by his name being used in the context of Professor Umbridge inspecting his class.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a Potions teacher at Hogwarts, as mentioned by his name being used in the context of handing back Harry's essay.

relationships.description: Harry received feedback on his moonstone essay from Snape, as mentioned by Snape's comment about awarding grades based on O.W.L. standards.
Hermione encouraged Harry to get going, as mentioned by her name being used in the context of urging him to hurry up.
Professor Umbridge inspected Binns's History of Magic class, as mentioned by her name being used in the context of inspecting classes.
